attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: After noticing that many mobile speed cameras set up in "non" accident black spots, it seems to me that all they are there for is to create extra revenue for there associated police force. I have noticed in Staffordshire especially that these mobile speed camera vans are setting up on roads that already have a HUGE number of fixed speed cameras, the A34 from stafford to Newcastle Under Lyme for instance. This surley goes against any reason for the fixed speed cameras to be there. After passing 3 fixed cameras and approaching a fourth, why is there a Mobile speed camera van?
